alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 23 at 4:04AM CST until December 24 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Lowest wind chills between zero and 5 above. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Alabama and northwest Florida. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to 10 AM CST Saturday. Lowest wind chills will occur Friday morning and again Friday night. * IMPACTS...Extremely low wind chill temperatures can increase the likelihood of adverse cold weather effects on the body such as frostbite and hypothermia.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory means that very cold air and strong winds will combine to generate low wind chills. Remain indoors in a warm area if possible, with only short times outdoors. If you must go outside, several layers of clothes will keep you warmer than a single heavy coat. A hat is also important as half your body heat loss can be from the head.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal
